summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued to S. Shakir by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding their appearance and production of all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena includes an attached rider detailing advice of rights and instructions for document production.

persons.name: S. Shakir
persons.context: Individual commanded to appear before the grand jury and produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena demands all materials relating to him from the recipient.

connections.description: Shakir is subpoenaed to produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating they are a person of interest in the investigation concerning Epstein.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, issued the subpoena commanding Shakir's appearance and document production.

events.title: Scheduled Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: S. Shakir is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is dated and issued to S. Shakir.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: S. Shakir was subpoenaed to appear before a grand jury on August 20, 2019, and produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein.
The subpoena demands a broad range of materials including text messages, emails, social media messages, documents, and notes concerning Epstein.
The subpoena covers electronically stored material on devices like computers, cellphones, and cloud accounts, even if located in foreign jurisdictions.
The alleged violations under investigation include 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (destruction/alteration of records).
